Title: Removing the Cap
Description:
Aemara's mention of a large fungarian planting fungal pods worries me. Gotta be someting down in dat cave.

We can't just be waitin' for the fungarians to attack with a nest of mind-controlled beasts. We gotta prune dat plan before it has a chance to bloom.

Get to Pillar-nest Vosh and kill that fungarian leader!
PortraitGiverText: Agaricus Festerbloom is the fungarian responsible for the mind controlled beast at Pillar-nest Vosh.
